Select Page
What We Do

At MHIF, we work every day to improve people’s lives through the highest-quality cardiovascular research and education. We test new treatments, medications and devices that aim to improve the longevity and quality of life of patients with heart disease, and provide information and tools to help prevent heart disease from occurring in the first place. The Minneapolis Heart Institute Foundation is one of the premier nonprofit cardiovascular and population health research centers in the country.

 
Who We Impact

Our work impacts people across the country and from all walks of life. Patients, caregivers, families and friends. Those at risk for heart disease or who just want to improve their health. Doctors who translate our research into better care for their patients. And our staff, who use the momentum of achievement to continue to work toward a world without heart and vascular disease.
